name: So you think you can Chad?: An Incel Dating Sim
name_original: So you think you can Chad?: An Incel Dating Sim
description:
I picked up Ren'Py after a long time and it's just as fun to play with as before. Thank you to @morinokaeru to let me steal vacation pictures for the backgrounds.

This was a little joke-y concept I wanted to play around with after talking with a colleague about incels. So I guess I'm putting a trigger warning for, uh, lousy reddit discourse, although it's pretty obvious from the title that it's about that. 

Please tell me if there are any bugs that I need to look out for in this release and if there's anything you liked or disliked about it! Thank you for playing!
